item.title: Ascii Generator by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[center][size=15pt]Ascii Generator v.1[/size]
by Ron[/center]

Description: This will generate Ascii Text!

Instructions: Run the script and type Letters and/or Numbers in!

{.Script Info:
# ScriptName  = Ascii Generator
# Author      = Ron from moparisthebest.com
# Description = Generates Ascii Text. Run the script and type in something.
# Version     = v.1
# Date        = October 15, 2006 at 2:05 PM [GTM-5]
# Comments    = Enjoy!
/Script Info}

Program Ascii_Generator_By_Ron;

Var
  Text : String;
  Line : Array[1..5] of String;

// Setup all the letters and numbers. From line 18 to 349.
Procedure LetterA;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '  /\  ';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + ' /  \ ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|    |';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|====|';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|    |';
End;

Procedure LetterB;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/==\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|  /';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '| < ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|  \';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|==/';
End;

Procedure LetterC;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + ' ===';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '/   ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|   ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '\   ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + ' ===';
End;

Procedure LetterD;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/==\ ';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   \';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|   |';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   /';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|==/ ';
End;

Procedure LetterE;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|===';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|== ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|===';
End;

Procedure LetterF;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|===';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|== ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|   ';
End;

Procedure LetterG;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/===\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '| ___';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|===|';
End;

Procedure LetterH;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|   |';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|===|';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|   |';
End;

Procedure LetterI;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '=====';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '  |  ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '  |  ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '  |  ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '=====';
End;

Procedure LetterJ;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '=====';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '   | ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '   | ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|  | ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|==/ ';
End;

Procedure LetterK;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|  /';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '| / ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|<  ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '| \ ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|  \';
End;

Procedure LetterL;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|   ';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|   ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|===';
End;

Procedure LetterM;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|    |';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|\  /|';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '| \/ |';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|    |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|    |';
End;

Procedure LetterN;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|   |';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|\  |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '| \ |';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|  \|';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|   |';
End;

Procedure LetterO;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/===\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|   |';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '\===/';
End;

Procedure LetterP;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/==\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|  |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|__/';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|   ';
End;

Procedure LetterQ;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/===\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '| \ |';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|  \|';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '\===\';
End;

Procedure LetterR;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|===\ ';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|    |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|___/ ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|  \  ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|   \ ';
End;

Procedure LetterS;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + ' /==\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '/    ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '\===\';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '    /';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '\==/ ';
End;

Procedure LetterT;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '=====';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '  |  ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '  |  ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '  |  ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '  |  ';
End;

Procedure LetterU;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|   |';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|   |';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '\===/';
End;

Procedure LetterV;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|      |';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '\      /';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + ' \    / ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '  \  /  ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '   \/   ';
End;

Procedure LetterW;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '|      |';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|      |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|      |';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '\  /\  /';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + ' \/  \/ ';
End;

Procedure LetterX;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '\    /';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + ' \  / ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '  \/  ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + ' /  \ ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '/    \';
End;

Procedure LetterY;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '\    /';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + ' \  / ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '  \/  ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '  ||  ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '  ||  ';
End;

Procedure LetterZ;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '=====';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '   / ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '  /  ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + ' /   ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '=====';
End;

Procedure Number1;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + ' ===|';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '/ |  ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '  |  ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '  |  ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|===|';
End;

Procedure Number2;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + ' /==\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '/   /';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '   / ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '  /  ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '|===/';
End;

Procedure Number3;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/==\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '   /';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '  < ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '   \';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '\==/';
End;

Procedure Number4;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '  /|';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + ' / |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|__|';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '   |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '   |';
End;

Procedure Number5;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/===\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|    ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|===\';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '    |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '\==/ ';
End;

Procedure Number6;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/===\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|    ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|___ ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '\===/';
End;

Procedure Number7;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '=====';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '    /';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '   / ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '  /  ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + ' /   ';
End;

Procedure Number8;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/===\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|===|';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '\===/';
End;

Procedure Number9;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/===\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '\===/';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '    |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '    |';
End;

Procedure Number0;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + '/===\';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + '|   |';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + '|   |';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + '|   |';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + '\===/';
End;

Procedure Separate;
Begin
  Line[1] := Line[1] + ' ';
  Line[2] := Line[2] + ' ';
  Line[3] := Line[3] + ' ';
  Line[4] := Line[4] + ' ';
  Line[5] := Line[5] + ' ';
End;

// LN() is used to call each of the above procedure.
Procedure LN(Number : Integer);
Begin
  Case Number of
    1  : LetterA;
    2  : LetterB;
    3  : LetterC;
    4  : LetterD;
    5  : LetterE;
    6  : LetterF;
    7  : LetterG;
    8  : LetterH;
    9  : LetterI;
    10 : LetterJ;
    11 : LetterK;
    12 : LetterL;
    13 : LetterM;
    14 : LetterN;
    15 : LetterO;
    16 : LetterP;
    17 : LetterQ;
    18 : LetterR;
    19 : LetterS;
    20 : LetterT;
    21 : LetterU;
    22 : LetterV;
    23 : LetterW;
    24 : LetterX;
    25 : LetterY;
    26 : LetterZ;
    27 : Number1;
    28 : Number2;
    29 : Number3;
    30 : Number4;
    31 : Number5;
    32 : Number6;
    33 : Number7;
    34 : Number8;
    35 : Number9;
    36 : Number0;
    // This is the space. It separates 4 times.
    37 : Begin Separate; Separate; Separate; Separate; End;
  End;
  // After each procedure is called, separate is called right after.
  Separate;
End;

// The Replace() function will replace a string with another string.
// Made by Ron. :)
Function Replace(TheString, Replacee, Replacer : String) : String;
Var
  a : LongInt;
Begin
  a := Pos(Replacee, TheString);
  If(a = 0)Then
  Begin
    // Do nothing...
  End Else
  Begin
    Delete(TheString, a, Length(Replacee));
    Insert(Replacer, TheString, a);
    Result := TheString;
  End;
End;

// The ReplaceAll() function will replace all strings with another string.
// Made by Ron. :)
Function ReplaceAll(TheString, Replacee, Replacer : String) : String;
Begin
  While (Not(Pos(Replacee, TheString) = 0)) do
  Begin
    TheString := Replace(TheString, Replacee, Chr(13));
  End;
  While (Not(Pos(Chr(13), TheString) = 0)) do
  Begin
    TheString := Replace(TheString, Chr(13), Replacer);
  End;
  Result := TheString;
End;

// Trims out all the whitespaces.
// Made by Ron :)
Function Trim2(Text : String) : String;
Begin
  Result := ReplaceAll(Text, ' ', '');
End;

// A very SICK function that checks if a string only has something.
// Only has numbers, only has letters, only has both, only only only!
// Made by Ron :)
Function Only(TheString : String; OnlyWhat : String) : Boolean;
Var
  a : Integer;
  Temp, Temp2, Temp3, Temp4, Temp5 : Integer;
Begin
  Result := False;
  If(Length(OnlyWhat) = 3)or(Length(OnlyWhat) = 6)Then
  Begin
    Temp2 := Min(GetKeyCode(OnlyWhat[1]), GetKeyCode(OnlyWhat[3]));
    Temp3 := Max(GetKeyCode(OnlyWhat[1]), GetKeyCode(OnlyWhat[3]));
    For a := 1 to Length(TheString) do
    Begin
      Temp := GetKeyCode(TheString[a]);
      If(Length(OnlyWhat) = 3)Then
      Begin
        If(Temp >= Temp2)and(Temp <= Temp3)Then
        Begin
          Result := True;
        End Else
        Begin
          Result := False;
          Break;
        End;
      End Else If(Length(OnlyWhat) = 6)Then
      Begin
        Temp4 := Min(GetKeyCode(OnlyWhat[4]), GetKeyCode(OnlyWhat[6]));
        Temp5 := Max(GetKeyCode(OnlyWhat[4]), GetKeyCode(OnlyWhat[6]));
        If((Temp >= Temp2)and(Temp <= Temp3))or(Temp >= Temp4)and(Temp <= Temp5)Then
        Begin
          Result := True;
        End Else
        Begin
          Result := False;
          Break;
        End;
      End;
    End;
  End Else
  Begin
    WriteLn('OnlyWhat has to have a length of 3 or 6.');
  End;
End;

Procedure Generate(Text : String);
Var
  Exc, Text2, LaN : String;
  i, n : Integer;
Begin
  Text2 := Trim2(Lowercase(Text));
  // If Text2 only has characters a to z or 0 to 9.
  // If contained both, it will still work.
  If(Only(Text2, 'a-z0-9'))Then
  Begin
    Exc := '!@#$%^&*()';
    For i := 1 to Length(Exc) do
    Begin
      If(Not(Pos(Exc[i], Text) = 0))Then
      Begin
        WriteLn('Only letters and/or numbers!');
        TerminateScript;
      End;
    End;
    LaN := 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz1234567890 ';
    For i := 1 to Length(Text) do
    Begin
      For n := 1 to 37 do
      Begin
        If(Text[i] = LaN[n])Then
        Begin
          LN(n);
        End;
      End;
    End;
    For i := 1 to 5 do
    Begin
      WriteLn(Line[i]);
    End;
  End Else
  Begin
    WriteLn('Only letters and/or numbers!');
    TerminateScript;
  End;
End;

Begin
  ClearDebug;
  // Change the report width to 0.
  ChangeReportWidth(0);
  // Prompt the question and lowercase all the letters.
  Text := Lowercase(ReadLn('Ascii Generator - Type in Letters and/or Numbers only!'));
  // Generate ascii text with what the user entered into Text.
  Generate(Text);
  WriteLn('Ascii Generator by Ron');
End.
=====      |    ===== |  / |===       ===   /\   |  / |=== 
  |        |      |   | /  |         /     /  \  | /  |    
  |        |      |   |<   |==       |    |    | |<   |==  
  |        |      |   | \  |         \    |====| | \  |    
=====      |=== ===== |  \ |===       === |    | |  \ |===

~Ron

Read full topic
